title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       The National Park Service strives to keep the public informed about its news, accomplishments, special events, and employee recognition.  The lakeshore provides news releases to local and regional newspapers.  Current and past news releases are also posted on this website. Public domain photographs are available at the Photo Gallery.  Superior Wildlands is an interagency newspaper published annually by Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Hiawatha National Forest, and Seney National Wildlife Refuge. This newspaper has information for visit planning and articles about the three agencies.   For all inquiries, call the park headquarters at 906-387-2607 or by email.
